resources.string: The app would not be able to connect to the controller without Bluetooth.
The location permission for the app has been denied. The app would not be able to connect to the controller without Bluetooth, which indirectly requires the location permission.
The storage permission for the app has been denied. The app would not be able to store the screenshots in a public directory.
This app is a client for Team Unununium\'s VR Robot.
Please allow the app to access Bluetooth to allow it to connect to the watch.
Although this app does not track your location, it is required to allow it to scan for nearby bluetooth devices.
Please allow the app to access your local storage to allow in-app screenshots to be stored on your device.
